question: 必勝
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>certain</kanji> <kanji>win</kanji> sounds like a great thing. When these two kanji are put together, a <vocabulary>certain victory</vocabulary> is inevitable.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Take note that the <ja>つ</ja> in <ja>ひつ</ja> is turned into a small <ja>っ</ja>, though.
